text: I'm having an issue with theme settings and child themes. I created a child theme of a custom theme using the "create child theme" dropdown option in the design manager. When we update theme settings for the parent theme, we see those settings apply to a template selected from the child theme. When we update theme settings for the child theme, those settings aren't being applied anywhere (including in the preview on the theme settings page). I feel like I have to be missing something pretty obvious - any idea what it is?
